I'm playing pubg with my pubg pals. They got onto the topic of investments. One of them has coins—BTC, LTC, and ETH. He asked if I hold any. I said yes—ZEC. He said that's a popular one. They don't know about my role—it's so refreshing. 🙂 Now back to shooting enemies.
